Of Gentylnes and Nobylyte. A dyaloge betwen the Marchaut the Knyght and the plowman dysputyng who is a verey Gentylman & who is a Noble man and how men shuld come to auctoryte / compilid in maner of an enterlude with divers toys & gestis addyd therto to make mery pastyme and disport.
